dialogue.name: Putin
dialogue.text: Fancy seeing you here, Elon. Vhat is it zis time?

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: Yeah I just wanted to ask you a few questions.

dialogue.name: Putin
dialogue.text: Elon, vhat did I say ze last time ve spoke? In zis country ve don't ask questions.

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: Could you humor me just this once, Putin? This is really important.

dialogue.name: Putin
dialogue.text: I've got to get back to assassinating my political opponents, I don't have ze time for zis.

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: Did you kill Dr. Bob? Yes or no?

dialogue.name: Putin
dialogue.text: Elon, I am former KGB. Everyone knows zis.

dialogue.name: Putin
dialogue.text: Don't give me a reason to kill you, just like I killed Dr. Joe.

dialogue.name: Putin
dialogue.text: Da, but I don't know who zis Dr. Bob iz.

accusation.name: Putin
accusation.text: I did not think it vould come to zis.
